question: Analyze the impact of social media on company revenue for the last financial year.

subtasks.task: Extract revenue data for all companies from the CompanyInfo table for the last financial year.
Retrieve social media engagement metrics from the SocialMediaInfo table for the same financial year for all companies.
Aggregate social media metrics to determine the overall engagement level for each company.
Join the revenue data from the CompanyInfo table with the aggregated social media engagement metrics to assess correlation.
Analyze and visualize the relationship between social media engagement and company revenue to draw conclusions.
